mapper.insert: insert into AGV( AGVID,AGVNo,AType, ASize,LoadCarry,Weight, Speed,BattTime,BattDist, BattPower,AGVIP,ServerIP, DNS,Port,AGVRFID, AGVSIMNo,IsDelete )values ( #{AGVID},#{AGVNo},#{AType}, #{ASize},#{LoadCarry},#{Weight}, #{Speed},#{BattTime},#{BattDist}, #{BattPower},#{AGVIP},#{ServerIP}, #{DNS},#{Port},#{AGVRFID},#{AGVSIMNo},#{IsDelete} )
mapper.update: update AGV set IsDelete=1 where AGVID=#{AGVID}
mapper.select: select * from AGV where AGVID=#{AGVID} and IsDelete=0
